update.name: Mi File Explorer v4.3 (201402241)
update.log: - Increase startup speed. - Optimized scrolling (is noticeably smoother) - Fixed FC on servers configuration page. - Fixed deleting net files. - Fixed copying from GDrive. - Fixed searching in categories. - Increased unrar speed (not encrypted). - Added directories history (at the end of directory path segments dialog). - Added auto update option in the settings page. - Added kill-app option in the settings page. - Added 'APE' as a music extension. - Fixed lots of other tiny bugs.
